snippet: The University of Colorado, Denver, that it has hired Robert N. Miller, a former United States attorney, to conduct a review of its procedures and actions in dealing with James E. Holmes.
abstract: University of Colorado, Denver, says it has hired Robert N Miller, a former United States attorney, to conduct a review of its procedures and actions in dealing with Aurora shooting suspect and former graduate student James E Holmes.
lead_paragraph: The University of Colorado, Denver, that it has hired Robert N. Miller, a former United States attorney, to conduct a review of its procedures and actions in dealing with James E. Holmes.

headline.main: Colorado: University Hires Ex-Prosecutor for Shooting Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Colorado: University Hires Ex-Prosecutor For Shooting Inquiry
